5.1.4.2
Prohibited Drive-thru Windows, Curb Cuts, and Driveways MCDD
and CDD-2 Zones
(1)
No vehicular drive-thru windows are permitted within 500 linear feet of
another existing drive-thru window as measured from property line to
property line.
(2)
No vehicular curb cuts or driveways over or through a public sidewalk
abutting a City or State road shall be created on the property where such
driveway or curb cut proposed directly abuts a municipal parking area or
easements to other properties that allow for access to the property [in
question].
(3) Section 5.1.4.2 shall apply to properties located within MCDD and CDD-2
only.
